data.name: EV Battery Safety and Performance Certification
data.description: Comprehensive safety and performance assessment of EV battery according to international standards

issuingAuthority.name: National Association of Testing Authorities, Australia

scope.name: ISO 12405-4:2018 - Test specification for lithium-ion traction battery packs and systems

referenceStandard.name: ISO 12405-4:2018 - Test specification for lithium-ion traction battery packs and systems

assessmentCriteria.name: Thermal Safety Requirements
assessmentCriteria.description: Battery pack must maintain safe operating temperatures during normal operation and fault conditions. Maximum temperature rise shall not exceed specified limits to prevent thermal runaway and ensure safe operation.

product.name: EcoCharge EV Battery Pack
product.description: High-performance automotive-grade lithium-ion battery pack designed for electric vehicles. Manufactured with responsibly sourced materials and a 95% recyclability rate, it reduces lifecycle emissions through eco-friendly production and verified recycling programs.

referenceStandard.name: ISO 12405-4:2018 - Test specification for lithium-ion traction battery packs and systems

reportingStandard.name: GHG Protocol Product Life Cycle Accounting and Reporting Standard
